page.title: 10A Typical Sunday At Sealand.
page.content: On Sundays a lot people go to Queensferry Church.The church is called The Sacred Heart Of The Blessed Trinity.The church starts at 10:00am till 11:00am. On Saturday, church is from 6:30pm till 7:30pm. Church is from 6:00pm till 7:30pm on Sunday nights too.I usually go to church on Sunday nights.I always go to church on holy days and if I get a chance to go when we are off school in the morning. The church has a collection of money for different people each week.I have been to the Queensferry church since I was a baby,I was Christened there too. I have been confirmed there by a bishop called Bishop Fox and I had my first Holy Communion there too.Our priest comes from Ireland and when he goes to see his family a monk comes and takes his place.
